# seqera_pipeline (Data Source)

Look up a pipeline by name.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `name` (String) Name of the pipeline to look up.
- `workspace_id` (Number) Workspace numeric identifier.

### Read-Only

- `description` (String) Description of the pipeline.
- `icon` (String) Icon identifier or URL for the pipeline.
- `pipeline_id` (Number) Pipeline numeric identifier.
- `repository` (String) Git repository URL containing the pipeline source code.
- `user_first_name` (String) First name of the pipeline creator.
- `user_id` (Number) User numeric identifier who created the pipeline.
- `user_name` (String) Username of the pipeline creator.
